name: Defeat Ahriman
Defeat 3 groups with 4 different monsters
Use exactly one Monk AND one Red Mage
Do NOT run from any battle in the Flying Fortress
Get all of the treasure in the Marsh Cave
Obtain an Emergency Exit from Purple Worm
Get the Mage's Staff in the Sunken Shrine
Buy 99 Phoenix Downs
Get at least 1 character to level 37
Cast Fira against a group of Bloodbones
Get at least 2 characters to level 29
Do NOT cast Flare
Get the Rat's Tail, but do NOT class change
Get all of the treasure in Mt. Duergar, including Excalibur
Defeat at least one Dark Fighter
Use at least 1 Elixir
Get Maximillian
Learn three Level 1, 2, and 3 spells for a character
Learn exactly two elemental damage spells
Obtain a Megalixir, but not from 15-tile puzzle
Defeat at least 3 Goblin Guards
Defeat Hyenadon
Get the Dragon Mail in the Mirage Tower
Get the Excalibur in Mt. Duergar
Unlock two blue seals in the Labyrinth of Time
